t:type.name: Invitation
t:type.t:description: Represents an invitation for a place

t:attribute.name: code
t:attribute.description: The platform-generated code for the invitation

t:attribute.name: placeId
t:attribute.description: The platform-owned identifier for the place

t:attribute.name: placeName
t:attribute.description: The name of the place

t:attribute.name: streetAddress1
t:attribute.description: First part of the street address

t:attribute.name: streetAddress2
t:attribute.description: Second part of the street address

t:attribute.name: city
t:attribute.description: The city

t:attribute.name: stateProv
t:attribute.description: The state

t:attribute.name: zipCode
t:attribute.description: The zip code

t:attribute.name: inviteeId
t:attribute.description: The platform-owned identifier for the invitee person if known

t:attribute.name: inviteeEmail
t:attribute.description: The email address of the invitee

t:attribute.name: inviteeFirstName
t:attribute.description: The first name of the invitee

t:attribute.name: inviteeLastName
t:attribute.description: The last name of the invitee

t:attribute.name: invitorId
t:attribute.description: The platform-owned identifier for the invitor person

t:attribute.name: invitorFirstName
t:attribute.description: The first name of the invitor

t:attribute.name: invitorLastName
t:attribute.description: The last name of the invitor

t:attribute.name: placeOwnerId
t:attribute.description: The platform-owned identifier for the owner of the place, which may be different from the invitor

t:attribute.name: placeOwnerFirstName
t:attribute.description: The first name of the place's owner

t:attribute.name: placeOwnerLastName
t:attribute.description: The last name of the place's owner

t:attribute.name: created
t:attribute.description: The timestamp that the invitation was created

t:attribute.name: accepted
t:attribute.description: The timestamp that the invitation was accepted

t:attribute.name: rejected
t:attribute.description: The timestamp that the invitation was rejected

t:attribute.name: rejectReason
t:attribute.description: Reason the person rejected the invite

t:attribute.name: relationship
t:attribute.description: The relationship to the invitee

t:attribute.name: invitationText
t:attribute.description: The content of the email

t:attribute.name: personalizedGreeting
t:attribute.description: End user provided content
